title: Wooden Stacking Montessori Toys for Kids 3-7 Years Old
description: These wooden dinosaur blocks are designed for children aged 3-7 years old, with a size that fits perfectly in their hands. It can help develop concentration, emotional control and stress resistance in children, while also providing a fun balance competition game for the whole family. This set includes 9 stacking methods and an instruction manual to help beginners learn and challenge themselves. An ideal gift for dinosaur fans, this set comes in a gift box perfect for Christmas, birthdays, Halloween, or taking on trips.

title: Rainbow Scratch Art Notes - Magic Note Pads for Kids Crafts Arts DIY Supplies Kit Birthday Toy Gifts for Girls Boys
description: Create amazing artwork with our Rainbow Scratch Art Notes! These magic notes sheets come with 125 individual pages and 5 styluses, perfect for kids of all ages to doodle, leave notes, write lists, and more. Made of premium paper and nature wooden stylus, these scratch art notes are safe and non-toxic. With different rainbow shades, you can create different effects with the same scratch pattern! Great for creative arts and crafts, surprise people, label things, make lists, and more.

title: Electronic Dance Mat for Kids Ages 3-8, Upgraded with Light Up and Music, 5 Game Modes and 3 Challenge Levels
description: Get your kids moving and grooving with this upgraded electronic dance mat! The mat features 5 interactive games modes with 3 difficulty levels for a fun and challenging experience. It also has a rest area and pause function so that kids can take a break when they get tired. The mat is made of waterproof PVC material, the surface is soft and slip-resistant, and it is easy to wipe clean. It is safe, environmentally friendly and non-toxic. The large size (34.64"X 39.37") is perfect for any indoor or outdoor scene, and the mat is foldable and easy to carry. Great for kids ages 3-8, this is the perfect gift for birthdays, holidays, and other special occasions!

title: LCD Writing Tablet for Kids, 10" Doodle Board Pad
description: This set of LCD Writing Tablets for Kids is perfect for unleashing their creativity and imagination! With a 10-inch pressure-sensitive LCD screen, no glare or blue light, no radiation, it can protect kid's eyes even after prolonged use. It's lightweight and portable, making it great for travel and outdoor use. Includes a stylus and magnets to stick the pad to the fridge. A great educational toy for kids of all ages!

title: Math Multiplication Table Toy - Fun and Durable Fidget Math Game
description: Improve your multiplication skills and have fun with this Math Multiplication Table Toy! Made of high quality silicone, this durable and safe toy can be repeatedly pressed for a long time. It also helps to relieve stress and anxiety with its "P00pd, P00pd" sound. Great for children, adults, and old people of all ages, this toy makes a great gift for your loved ones!

title: Magnetic Blocks STEM Toys for Boys and Girls Ages 3+
description: Let your kids explore their creative side with these Magnetic Blocks STEM Toys! Compatible with major brands, these magnetic blocks are made with stainless steel security for both magnets and plastic housing structure, ensuring safety for your little ones. With these blocks, your kids can develop math, science, spatial, and tactile skills while learning how to problem-solve and work as a part of a team. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor activities, these magnetic blocks are the perfect boredom busters and memory makers for kids ages 3 and up.

title: Hasbro Gaming Marvel Spider-Man Web Warriors Chutes & Ladders Game
description: Enjoy a classic game of Chutes & Ladders with a Marvel twist! Play as Spider-Man, White Tiger, Iron Spider, Power Man, Venom, Black Cat, Green Goblin or Rhino as you race to the Winner 100 square first. Spin the spinner and go where it tells you, but watch out for chutes! Includes gameboard, spinner with arrow and base, 8 character pawns, 4 pawn stands, and instructions. Perfect for 3+ years old.

title: Hasbro Gaming Simon Handheld Electronic Memory Game
description: Challenge your memory with this classic electronic game of lights and sounds; Players must repeat random sequences of flashing lights by pressing the colored pads in the correct order. As the game progresses, the light sequences become more complex. Play with friends or solo and try to beat your high score! This handheld Simon game is suitable for ages 8 and up and includes the game unit and instructions.

title: Flexible Dinosaur Road Race Track Set with 2 Cars and Accessories
description: Create a unique dinosaur world with this flexible track playset! Includes 144 track pieces, 4 trees, 2 dinosaurs, 2 dinosaur cars, 1 door, 1 bridge, 2 slopes, 8 traffic signs, and 4 car tires. The dynamic track pieces can twist left or right for a variety of layouts and designs. The dinosaur cars require 1x"AA" battery (not included) and the dinosaur molds make the game more interesting and attractive. Packed in a colorful box, this set is the perfect gift for kids. Durable, safe, and non-toxic, this track set is sure to provide hours of fun for 3-6 year-olds.

title: 3 Pack Rainbow Scratch Off Notebooks Arts Crafts Supplies for Kids
description: Pigipigi brings you a super value combo of 3 rainbow scratch off notebooks in 3 different sizes (Large: 10*7inch/Medium: 8*5.5inch/Small: 5.5*4inch), 6 wooden styluses (5.5inch) and 4 drawing stencils (6*2.6inch). This set of kids paper craft features bright colors and patterns hidden beneath the matte coating, perfect for encouraging your children's creativity and imagination. The premium material ensures long lasting use and the natural paper & wood makes it safe for your children to create beautiful art works. Great for drawing class, school art craft project family fun day, art class, and classroom activity. An amazing painting experience and perfect for party favors, kid's birthday, Easter Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day, Thanksgiving Day and Christmas gifts.

title: Animal Bean Bag Toss Game Toy for Kids
description: Enjoy hours of fun with this Animal Bean Bag Toss Game Toy! This 2 in 1 game combines a hole board and a dart board into one, and includes 10 beanbags and 10 balls. Made of high-quality thick fabric, it is safe and durable, and can be easily set up and stored. Perfect for kids ages 3-6, this game will help with learning to take turns and get a little exercise. A great gift for any occasion, it is sure to bring hours of fun for the whole family!

title: Wooden Stacking Rocks Building Blocks Toys for Kids Ages 1-7
description: Stimulate your child’s imagination and creativity with these Wooden Stacking Rocks Building Blocks! This set of 40 blocks comes in 10 colors and 6 sizes for endless hours of fun. Made with high-quality, durable wood and non-toxic water-based paint, these blocks are certified to meet US toy safety standards. Perfect for kids ages 1-7, these blocks help improve concentration, patience, manual ability, logical thinking, and fine motor skills. A great activity for family time, kids' parties, and pre-school. An ideal gift for any occasion!

title: Montessori Wooden Magnet Puzzle Game Board
description: Perfect for toddlers and preschoolers, this Montessori Wooden Magnet Puzzle Game Board is a great way to explore colors and numbers. With 10 built-in "coffee cups" and 55 magnetic beads in 10 bright colors, kids can practice counting and matching while developing fine motor skills. The magnetic wands make it easy for kids to move the beads through the maze and drop them into each paint can. Made of hardwood and water-based paint, this maze is sturdy and safe for little hands. Give the gift of learning and fun with this Magnetic Color and Number Maze.

title: Hasbro Bulls-Eye Ball Game - Active Electronic Game for Kids Ages 8 and Up
description: Test your skills with the Hasbro Bulls-Eye Ball game! This active electronic game is designed for 1 or more players and features 5 exciting modes of play. Challenge family and friends to score the most points by bouncing balls into the target. Ideal for kids ages 8 and up, this game makes a great holiday or birthday gift. Small enough to pack up and take to parties, the Bulls-Eye Ball game is sure to bring hours of fun!

title: National Geographic Magic Chemistry Set – Science Kit for Kids
description: Get ready for some magical science fun with the National Geographic Magic Chemistry Set! This exciting science kit includes 10 amazing magic tricks, STEM projects and science experiments that will amaze and educate your kids. With the included magic wand and white gloves, your children can dress up and show off their experiments to friends and family. The included experiment guide has illustrated, kid-friendly instructions as well as insight into the science that creates the magic. Everything you need for each experiment is included, so you can start the fun the moment you open the box! High-quality educational toys backed by exceptional service.

title: Move2Play Pass the Potato | Fun and Exciting Kids Game | Ages 4-8 | Indoor & Outdoor Toy
description: Get ready for a wild and hilarious time with Move2Play Pass the Potato! This classic game will have your little ones laughing and passing the spud around like their life depends on it! With super-smart potato sensors and over 30 hilarious phrases, this spud is ready to take your kids on a wild potato adventure. Perfect for active play, this game is adjustable with high/low volume, machine washable, and requires 3xAAA batteries. A great gift for kids ages 4-8, this game guarantees a good time for all!

title: 8.5 Inch LCD Writing Tablet for Kids - Educational Toys for Boys Girls
description: Get creative with the 8.5 Inch LCD Writing Tablet for Kids! These educational toys are perfect for boys and girls of all ages, featuring a colorful design and one button clearance. The highly sensitive pressure sensing allows for writing and drawing as if it were on paper, with no mess. The tablet is equipped with a CR2025 battery for low power consumption, and is lightweight and portable for travel use. The durable ABS material is waterproof and dropproof, making this the perfect gift for your children.

title: Pop Fidget Game Toys - Quick Push Bubble Stress Light Up Game for Kids 6-8
description: Get ready for a fun and exciting gaming experience with the Pop Fidget Game Toys! This 2023 latest mini handheld game machine is designed to help kids think positively and react quickly in challenging levels. It features 4 game modes with different levels of difficulty, allowing children to gain a sense of accomplishment from advanced breakthroughs. It also supports parent-child interaction and multiplayer mode for children to play with their friends. This game is made of high-quality ABS and silicone material, making it safe and durable for long-term use. It is perfect for kids, teens, and even adults, making it a great gift for any occasion. Enjoy playing anywhere and anytime with this fidget game! (Batteries not included)

title: HOMELAM Stacking Blocks Tetra Balance Game - 32 PCS
description: Enjoy hours of fun and learning with this HOMELAM Stacking Blocks Tetra Balance Game! This Montessori block set toy is easy to play, and helps children to recognize colors and shapes, develop imagination and creativity, fine motor skills, operability, thinking and problem-solving skills, structural elements and design skills. It is perfect for all occasions: parties, birthdays, holidays, Christmas and more. With its colorful and eye-catching design, this game is sure to keep your kids entertained for hours!

title: Wonder Forge Disney Princess Matching Game for Boys & Girls Age 3 to 5
description: Enjoy a fun and fast Disney memory game with your kids! This game comes with 72 tiles and clear instructions, making it easy to learn in less than five minutes. Your little ones will develop their focus, memory, and matching skills as they play with beautiful pictures of their favorite Disney Princesses, such as Snow White, Cinderella, Aurora, Ariel, Belle, Jasmine, Pocahontas, Mulan, Tiana, Rapunzel, and Merida. Perfect for solo play or family time, this game takes only 15 minutes to complete.
